subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Women
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Perhaps the only relief for the Rams is that they have time to avoid breaking the N.C.A.A. record of 58 consecutive losses, set by Long Island University from 1987 to 1989.
snippet: Perhaps the only relief for the Rams is that they have time to avoid breaking the N.C.A.A. record of 58 consecutive losses, set by Long Island University from 1987 to 1989.
